question: 要让一个顶级项目(TLP)的发布投票得到通过，你需要满足: For a vote on a top level project release to pass you need:

answers.answer: 3个或更多的+1票。3 or more +1 votes.
answers.hint: Apache 发布使用多数批准投票，你需要得到3个或更多+1票，并且+1票数要多过-1票数。Releases use majority approval voting in which 3 or more +1 votes and more +1s than -1.

answers.answer: +1票数要多过-1票数。 More +1s votes than -1s votes.
answers.hint: Apache 发布使用多数批准投票，你需要得到3个或更多+1票，并且+1票数要多过-1票数。Releases use majority approval voting in which 3 or more +1 votes and more +1s than -1.

answers.answer: 3个或更多的+1票，并且+1票数要多过-1票数。 3 or more +1 votes and more +1s than -1s.
answers.hint: Apache 发布使用多数批准投票，你需要得到3个或更多+1票，并且+1票数要多过-1票数。Releases use majority approval voting in which 3 or more +1 votes and more +1s than -1.

answers.answer: 一个-1票会停止投票。 One -1 stops the vote.
answers.hint: 发布不能被否决。 Releases can't be vetoed.

answers.answer: 普通用户的投票是有效的(binding)并被累计。 Votes by users are binding and count.
answers.hint: 只有 PMC 成员的投票是有效的。 Only PMC members votes count on releases.

answers.answer: Committer的投票是有效的(binding)并被累计。 Votes by committer are binding and count.
answers.hint: 只有 PMC 成员的投票是有效的。 Only PMC members votes count on releases.

answers.answer: PMC 成员的投票是有效的(binding)并被累计。
answers.hint: 只有 PMC 成员的投票是有效的。 Votes by PMC members are binding and count.

answers.answer: 一旦得到3个+1票，就算通过。 Passes as soon as you get 3 +1 votes.
answers.hint: 你需要留出足够的时间让每个人投票。 You need to allow enough time for everyone to vote.

answers.answer: 投票应至少开放72小时。 Passes as soon as you get 3 +1 votes.
answers.hint: 你需要留出足够的时间让每个人投票 You need to allow enough time for everyone to vote.

reason: 发布使用多数批准投票（即至少3个 + 1票和+1票多于-1票），投票应开放72小时，以便每个人都有机会投票。Releases use majority approval voting (i.e at least 3 +1 votes and more +1 votes than -1 votes) and the vote should to be open 72 hours so that everyone has a chance to vote.

question: 对于发布，PMC（项目管理委员会）必须: For a release a PMC (Project management committee) must:

answers.answer: 做正式发布（official release）。Publish official releases.
answers.hint: 只有通过正式投票的发布才是被允许的。Only official voted on releases are allowed.

answers.answer: 引导用户到快照发布。Direct users towards snapshot releases.
answers.hint: 用户应该被引导到官方发布。Users should be directed to only official releases

answers.answer: 引导用户到每日构建(nightly build)。Direct users towards nightly builds.
answers.hint: 用户应该被引导到官方发布。Users should be directed to only official releases

answers.answer: 从下载页链接到每日构建。Link to nightly builds from their download page.
answers.hint: 用户应该被引导到官方发布。Users should be directed to only official releases.

answers.answer: 发布 maven 工件。Publish maven artifacts.
answers.hint: Maven 只是备用分发机制。Maven is a secondary distribution mechanism.

answers.answer: 提供二进制发布版本。Provide a binary release.
answers.hint: Apache 发布开源代码，二进制版本仅为方便使用而提供。Apache releases open source, binaries are provided as a convenience only.

reason: Apache 发布源代码版本，用户只能被引导到已经通过投票的官方版本。Apache only produces source releases and users can only be directed to official releases that have been voted on.

question: 每个 ASF 发布必须包含: Each ASF release must contain:

answers.answer: LICENSE 文件。A LICENSE file.
answers.hint: 每个发布版本都必须包含Apache License 2.0的全文。Each release must contain the full text of the Apache License 2.0.

answers.answer: NOTICE 文件。A NOTICE file
answers.hint: 按照 ASF 政策，这个 NOTICE 文件是必需的。 使用 ALv2 的第三方软件不强制有 NOTICE 文件。A NOTICE file is required by ASF policy. 3rd party licensed ALv2 software do not require a NOTICE file.

answers.answer: LICENSE 文件中必须提及所有捆绑软件的许可证（使用 ALv2 许可的第三方软件除外）。All licenses (except 3rd party Apache V2 licensed software) of bundled software must be mentioned in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 该版本的用户需要知道所有许可条款，因此最好将其保存在一个位置。Any users of the release need to know all of the license terms and it's best to keep that in one place.

answers.answer: 必须在 LICENSE 中提及所有依赖软件的许可证（使用 ALv2 许可的第三方软件除外）。All licenses (except 3rd party Apache V2 licensed) of dependencies must be mentioned in LICENSE.
answers.hint: LICENSE 和 NOTICE 中仅提及第三方捆绑软件。Only 3rd party bundled software should be mentioned in LICENSE and NOTICE.

answers.answer: 在 LICENSE 中列出发行版中包含的所有ALv2许可软件。List all ALv2 license software in LICENSE contained within the release.
answers.hint: 虽然列出发布中捆绑的所有 Apache 许可软件是个好主意，但这不是必需的。While it's a good idea to list all Apache licensed software bundled in a release it's not required.

answers.answer: 对于该版本中包含的每个 ALv2 许可的软件，在 LICENSE 中列出其许可证全文。For each ALv2 license software contained within the release include the full text of each in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 即使您的版本中捆绑了多个 ALv2 软件，也只需要包含一次 ALv2 的全文。The full text of the ALv2 is only needed to be included once even if you have multiple ALv2 bits of software bundled in your release.

answers.answer: LICENSE 和 NOTICE 文件可以放在发行版的任何位置。The LICENSE and NOTICE files can be anywhere in the release.
answers.hint: LICENSE 和 NOTICE 文件必须位于发行版的根目录中。The LICENSE and NOTICE files must be in the root of the release.

answers.answer: 可在 LICENSE 和 NOTICE 中提供额外的信息材料。Extra informational material can be provided in LICENSE and NOTICE.
answers.hint: 只需要有关捆绑软件的必需信息。Only required information about bundled software is required.

answers.answer: 有关依赖关系的信息可以在 LICENSE 中提供。Information about dependencies can be provided in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 只有相关捆绑软件的许可信息才需要包含在 LICENSE 或 NOTICE中。Only information about what licensed software is bundled needs to be included in LICENSE or NOTICE.

answers.answer: 对于所有捆绑软件，必须包含其许可证的全文。For any bundled software the full text of it's license must be included.
answers.hint: 许可证信息需要在 LICENSE 中列出。 您还可以指向其许可证信息（例如另一个本地文件）。License information needs to be listed in LICENSE. You can also use pointers to licence information.

answers.answer: LICENSE 中可以包含捆绑软件许可证的 URL。A URL to the license(s) of bundled software can be included in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 不能使用 URL，需要指向包含许可证全文的本地文件。A pointer needs to point to a local file containing the full text of the license.

answers.answer: 所有 ASF 源文件都要有 ASF 标头。All ASF source files have ASF headers.
answers.hint: 所有源文件都必须具有 ASF 标头，除非它们属于另一个许可证。All source files must have the ASF header unless they are under another license

answers.answer: DEPENDENCIES 文件。A DEPENDENCIES file.
answers.hint: ASF 政策不要求有 DEPENDENCIES 文件。 但是包含一个这样的文件是有帮助的。A DEPENDENCIES file is not required by ASF policy. However it is helpful to include one。

answers.answer: jar 文件
answers.hint: Apache 发布源代码，源代码发行版不能包含任何已编译的代码。Apache releases source code and a source release can't contain any compiled code.

reason: 一个发行版应包含 LICENSE 和 NOTICE 文件，并且只有必需的信息才能放在 LICENSE 和 NOTICE 中。 LICENSE 文件应列出所有捆绑的软件许可证，但可以省略 ALv2 许可证。A release should contain a LICENSE and NOTICE file and only required information be placed in LICENSE and NOTICE. The LICENSE file should list all bundled software licenses, but may omit ALv2 ones.

question: ASF 有自己的发布政策，因为： The ASF has a release policy because:

answers.answer: 它为参与发布的人员提供法律保护。 It provides legal protection for people involved in the release.
answers.hint: 为了提供法律保护，需要区分进行中的工作和已发布的工作。 To provide legal protection there needs to be a distinction between in progress work and released work.

answers.answer: Apache 喜欢官僚主义。Apache loves bureaucracy.
answers.hint: Apache 试图将官僚主义保持在最低限度，但有些是法律保护和开放所必需的。 Apache tries to keep bureaucracy to a minimum but some is required for legal protection and openness.

answers.answer: 为了降低法律保护成本。To reduce the cost of legal protection.
answers.hint: 不遵守政策可能会削弱受到的法律保护，或导致保险费的提高。Not following policy may lessen on the legal protection provided or raise insurance premiums.

answers.answer: 鼓励社区参与。To encourage community participation.
answers.hint: 发布带来的仪式感可以鼓励社区的参与。Having a ceremony around releases encourages participation.

answers.answer: 这样构建可以很容易重现。So that the builds are easily reproducible.
answers.hint: 如果在构建中发现问题，您可能需要重新创建发布或修复问题并制作新发布。If an issue is found with a build you may need to recreate the release or fix the issue and make a new release.

answers.answer: 保留所有决策和变更的历史记录。To keep a history of all decisions and changes.
让所有人都可以看到一个开放的过程。To have an open process visible by anyone.
answers.hint: Apache 以开放的流程生产开源软件。 Apache produces open source software in the open.

answers.answer: 绕过一些软件许可条款。To get around some software licenses clauses.
answers.hint: 所有发布必须符合 Apache 法律政策和任何包含的第三方许可。All release must comply with Apache legal policy and any contained 3rd party licenses.

answers.answer: 作为快速制作软件的障碍。As a barrier to quickly making software releases.
answers.hint: 制作发布并经常制作它们，以便更容易审查。Make releases and make them often they way they are easier to review.

answers.answer: Apache 喜欢复杂性。Apache loves complexity.
answers.hint: 最好保持发布过程简单，以便其他人可以轻松执行。Is best to keep the release process simple so it can be easily performed by others.

reason: 发布政策旨在为发布者提供法律保护。The release policy exists to provide legal protection to those making the release.

links.name: 为什么我们需要一个基础广泛的政策？Why do we need a foundation wide policy?

question: 在新发布的投票表决之前，一个PMC成员必须：

answers.answer: 检查候选版本符合 ASF 法务政策。
answers.hint: 一个发布版本必须符合 ASF 的政策。

answers.answer: 检查候选版本符合 ASF 发布政策。
answers.hint: 一个发布版本必须符合 ASF 的政策。

answers.answer: 检查候选版本拥有合法的签名。
answers.hint: 所有的发布版本必须有合法的签名,否则它们有可能会被篡改。

answers.answer: 检查候选版本拥有 LICENSE 和 NOTICE 文件说明。
answers.hint: ASF政策要求 LICENSE 和 NOTICE 这两个文件。

answers.answer: 检查候选版本能编译通过。
answers.hint: 不能编译通过的发布没有什么意义。

answers.answer: 在他们机器上测试编译后的版本。
answers.hint: 发布必须通过测试证明软件能正常工作。当然，它们有些小 bug 也是容忍的。

answers.answer: 检查发布的版本和版本控制树上的一致。
answers.hint: 发布需要是可重现发布。

answers.answer: 检查没有严重的 bug。
answers.hint: 软件都有 bug。但我们致力于比上一个发布更好的产品。

answers.answer: 检查文档是否最新的。
answers.hint: 投票表决前，虽然文档不是必须的，但是很有帮助的。

answers.answer: 所有的测试能通过。
answers.hint: 一个失败的测试可能是个隐患。但在投票表决前，我们并不强制要求所有的测试成功。

reason: 在投票表决之前，一个 PMC 成员需要检查签名，发布符合 ASF 政策诸如含有 LICENSE, NOTICE 文件，发布能编译，产品能工作。

links.name: 必须在自己所拥有的机器上确认过。

question: 新版本发布后，PMC 必须做的有？

answers.answer: 将软件成品发布到 www.apache.org/dist。
answers.hint: 这个是官方的发布位置，也是其他的镜像的来源之所。

answers.answer: 发布 maven 软件成品。
answers.hint: Maven 是一种二级分发机制。

answers.answer: 向用户，开发者邮件列表通告新的发布。
answers.hint: 通告新的发布是个好主意。

answers.answer: 手动的存档以前的发布。
answers.hint: 以前的发布是会自动存档的。

answers.answer: 最好是等24小时之后公告以便其它的镜像能够及时获取新的发布。
answers.hint: 其它的镜像可能很需要花些时间才能获取我们新发布的软件。

reason: 发布需要发布到正确的位置，并且要及时告知社区。

question: 下面哪些 license 文件是和 Apache License 2.0 相兼容并相似的？

answers.answer: Apache Software License 1.0.
answers.hint: The Apache Software License 1.0 包含广告条款。

answers.answer: Apache Software License 1.1.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: BSD 2-clause.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: BSD 3-clause.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: BSD with advertising clause.
answers.hint: 其广告条款和 Apache License 2.0不相容

answers.answer: MIT or X11 license.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: W3C software license.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: GNU GPL 1, 2, 3.
answers.hint: GPL License 软件的衍生软件也必须是 GPL License

answers.answer: GNU LGPL 2, 2.1, 3.
answers.hint: GPL License 软件的衍生软件也必须是GPL License

answers.answer: JSON license.
answers.hint: 善恶是主观的。

answers.answer: Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 2.5, 3.0, and 4.0.
answers.hint: Category B licenses 需要非常谨慎的处理。

answers.answer: Creative Commons Non-Commercial.
answers.hint: 只能供非商业用途是个限制性条款。

answers.answer: Creative Commons Copyright-Only Dedication.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

answers.answer: Eclipse Public License EPL 1.0.
answers.hint: Category B licenses 需要非常谨慎的处理。

answers.answer: Common Development and Distribution Licenses: CDDL 1.0 and CDDL 1.1.
answers.hint: Category B licenses 需要非常谨慎的处理。

answers.answer: Works in the public domain.
answers.hint: 一个没有增加限制条款的 License 是相兼容的。

reason: 在 Apache License 2.0 基础上没有增加额外的限制性条款的 License 都是和 Apache License 2.0 相兼容的。

question: Apache 分发能使用禁止使用（目录X）协议的软件吗？ Can Apache distribute products under a prohibited ('Category X') license?

answers.answer: 可以，我们可以分发任何基于目录X的软件。 Yes for any Category X bundled software.
answers.hint: 禁止的协议的软件是不能分发的。 Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed.

answers.answer: 不可以（但是有一些特殊的意外情况）No (with a couple of rare exceptions).
answers.hint: 禁止的协议的软件是不能分发的。 Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed.

answers.answer: 可以，但是只能针对只能针对一些通用的软件构建工具。 Yes but only for some common build tools.
answers.hint: 有一些禁止许可协议的构建工具软件是能够分发的。 Some prohibited licensed build tool software can be distributed.

reason: 禁止的协议的软件是不能分发的。 Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed.

question: Apache项目可以依赖使用禁止使用（目录X）协议的软件吗？Can Apache rely on products under a prohibited ('Category X') license?

answers.answer: 对于所有的依赖都是可以的。 Yes for all dependencies.
answers.hint: Apache 项目是不能依赖禁止使用的协议的软件的。 Prohibited licensed software can not be an external dependency.

answers.answer: 不行 No.
answers.hint: Apache项目是不能依赖禁止使用的协议的软件的。 Prohibited licensed software can not be an external dependency.

answers.answer: 只有一些特殊的可选依赖可以。 Only if it's an optional dependency.
answers.hint: 是不是大部分的用户需要使用这些可选的依赖组件。 Do the majority of the users need this optional component?

reason: 大部分的禁止协议软件是不能分发的，除非你依赖了一下特殊的可选依赖。 Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed but you can rely on optional dependencies.

question: 如果第三方的绑定依赖软件使用了双协议，你需要怎么做？ If a third party bundled bit of software is dual licensed what do you do?

answers.answer: 将这些协议都包含至 LICENSE中。 Include both licenses in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。 Select the most permissive license and use that.

answers.answer: 通过扔硬币的方式来选择一个协议包含在 LICENSE 中。 Toss a coin and put one license in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。Select the most permissive license and use that.

answers.answer: 在 NOTICE 文件中加一个声明。 Put a note in NOTICE about this.
answers.hint: 只在 NOTICE 文件中添加必要的信息。 Only required information should go in NOTICE

answers.answer: 选择一个最自由的协议，并把这个协议放到 LICENSE 文件中。Select the most permissive license and put that in LICENSE.
answers.hint: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。Select the most permissive license and use that.

answers.answer: 协议选择顺序是：目录A的协议最优，其次是目录B协议，最后是目录X。选择好协议之后把它放到 LICENS 文件中。Prefer a Category A license over a Category B license over a Category X license and include that.
answers.hint: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。Select the most permissive license and use that.

answers.answer: 什么都不需要做。 Nothing is required to be done.
answers.hint: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。Select the most permissive license and use that.

reason: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。不要包含禁止使用协议软件。Select the most permissive license and use that. Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed.

question: 对于第三方的 Notice 文件需要怎么处理？ What are required third party notices?

answers.answer: 没有人知道。Nobody knows.
answers.hint: 是的，有些时候好像是这样，就没有包含在在 LICENSE 中的声明信息都需要放到 NOTICE中。 Well it sometimes seems that way. Any required notice that is not in LICENSE Should go in NOTICE.

answers.answer: 第三方的版权申明信息。 Third party copyright notices.
answers.hint: 大部分情况版权信息都是放在 LICENSE 文件中。 例外情况是NOTICE中有重新定义了版权信息或者是使用Apache V2软件协议的第三方软件的版权信息。 Copyrights usually go in LICENSE. The exceptions are relocated copyrights and copyrights from 3rd party Apache license v2 NOTICE files.

answers.answer: 许可定义。 License terms.
answers.hint: 许可定义需要放在 LICENSE 文件中， NOTICE中只包含必要的信息。 License terms should be listed in LICENSE. Only required information should go in NOTICE.

answers.answer: 许可列表。 list of licenses.
answers.hint: 许可定义需要放在 LICENSE 文件中， NOTICE中只包含必要的信息。Licenses should be listed in LICENSE. Only required information should go in NOTICE.

answers.answer: 按照第三方软件的要求提供一个列表，把针对第三方软件修改的内容都列出来。 A list of all changes to software when the third party software requires that.
answers.hint: NOTICE 中只需要包含没有在 LICENSE 中申明的第三方声明。 Only required third party notices not listed in LICENSE need to be included in NOTICE.

answers.answer: 如果第三方协议要求，需要提供一个原始软件的链接。 A link to the original software if the third party license requires that.
answers.hint: NOTICE 中只需要包含没有在 LICENSE 中申明的第三方声明。Only required third party notices not listed in LICENSE need to be included in NOTICE.

reason: 选择一个最自由的协议，并使用它。不要包含禁止使用协议软件。Select the most permissive license and use that. Prohibited licensed software can not be distributed.

question: 绑定时，哪些第三方许可需要在 LICENSE 中列出？ Which third party licenses need to be listed in LICENSE when bundled?

answers.answer: Apache software License 1.0.
answers.hint: Apache Software License 1.0 包含了广告条款且不兼容。The Apache Software License 1.0 contains an advertising clause and is not compatible.

answers.answer: Apache software License 1.1.
answers.hint: 所有的许可（或指向许可文本的指针）都需要在 LICENSE 中列出。All licenses (or a pointer to the license text) need to be listed in LICENSE.

answers.answer: Apache software License 2.0.
answers.hint: Apache 许可的文本已包含，不需要包含它两次。The text of the Apache license is already included there's no need to include it twice.

answers.answer: BSD 2-clause.
answers.hint: 所有的许可（或指向许可文本的指针）都需要在 LICENSE 中列出。All licenses (or a pointer to the license text) need to be listed in LICENSE.

answers.answer: BSD 3-clause.
answers.hint: 所有的许可（或指向许可文本的指针）都需要在 LICENSE 中列出。All licenses (or a pointer to the license text) need to be listed in LICENSE.

answers.answer: MIT or X11 license.
answers.hint: 所有的许可（或指向许可文本的指针）都需要在 LICENSE 中列出。All licenses (or a pointer to the license text) need to be listed in LICENSE.

answers.answer: W3C software license.
answers.hint: 所有的许可（或指向许可文本的指针）都需要在 LICENSE 中列出。All licenses (or a pointer to the license text) need to be listed in LICENSE.

answers.answer: GNU GPL 1, 2, 3.

question: 绑定时，哪些第三方软件许可可能会导致 NOTICE 的修改？ Which third party software licenses will likely cause NOTICE to be modified when bundled?

answers.answer: Apache software License 2.0 without a NOTICE file.
answers.hint: 如果没有 NOTICE 文件，则 NOTICE 中不必包含任何内容。With no NOTICE file it's unlikely anything needs to be included in NOTICE.

answers.answer: Apache software License 2.0 with a NOTICE file.
answers.hint: 即使是样板 NOTICE 文件，也需要考虑版权信息。Even for boilerplate NOTICE file the copyright line needs to be considered.

answers.answer: BSD 2-clause.
answers.hint: 您需要将许可文本添加到 LICENSE 而不是 NOTICE。You add the license text to LICENSE not NOTICE.

answers.answer: BSD 3-clause.
answers.hint: 您需要将许可文本添加到 LICENSE 而不是 NOTICE。You add the license text to LICENSE not NOTICE.

answers.answer: MIT or X11 license.
answers.hint: 您需要将许可文本添加到 LICENSE 而不是 NOTICE。You add the license text to LICENSE not NOTICE.

answers.answer: W3C software license.
answers.hint: 您需要将许可文本添加到 LICENSE 而不是 NOTICE。You add the license text to LICENSE not NOTICE.

reason: NOTICE 仅包含 ASF 版权，重新定位的版权声明，绑定软件的 NOTICE 文件的内容和所需的第三方声明。NOTICE only contains ASF copyright, relocated copyright statements, contents of bundled software NOTICE files and required third party notices.

question: ASF 项目的 NOTICE 文件应包含哪些内容？An ASF project's NOTICE file should contain?

answers.answer: 项目名。The project name.
ASF 版权信息。The ASF copyright line.
绑定的许可列表。A list of bundled licenses.
answers.hint: 许可需要在 LICENSE 而不是 NOTICE 中列出。Licenses need to be listed in LICENSE not NOTICE.

answers.answer: 重新定位的版权声明。Relocated copyright statements
answers.hint: 如果是通过软件授权捐赠的，需要原始软件的版权所有者。The copyright owner of the original software if it was donated via a software grant.

answers.answer: 来自第三方许可的版权信息。Copyright lines from 3rd party licenses
answers.hint: 这些通常包含在 LICENSE 中，包括 LICENSE 的文本。These are usually included in LICENSE by including the text of the LICENSE.

answers.answer: 绑定的 Apache licensed 2.0 的软件的 NOTICE 内容。Contents from bundled Apache licensed 2.0 NOTICE file
answers.hint: 绑定软件中任何 Apache licensed 2.0 NOTICE 文件的内容都需要传播到 NOTICE 文件。Contents of any Apache licensed 2.0 NOTICE file in bundled software needs to be propagated to the NOTICE file.

answers.answer: 任何需要的第三方通告。Any required 3rd party notices
answers.hint: 通常很少见，第三方要求的通告在 NOTICE 中列出。3rd party required notices are listed in NOTICE. This is usually rare.

answers.answer: 依赖项列表。A list of dependencies
answers.hint: 依赖关系不需要在 LICENSE 或 NOTICE 中列出。Dependencies do not need to be listed in LICENSE or NOTICE.

answers.answer: 以下内容：本产品包含了 Apache Software Foundation（http://www.apache.org/）开发的软件。A line with: This product includes software developed at The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
answers.hint: 软件是在 Apache Software Foundation 开发的。Software is developed at the Apache Software Foundation.

answers.answer: 以下内容：本产品包含由 Apache Software Foundation（http://www.apache.org/）开发的软件。A line with: This product includes software developed by The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
answers.hint: 软件是在 Apache Software Foundation 开发的。Software is developed at the Apache Software Foundation.

reason: NOTICE 仅包含项目名称，ASF 版权，重新定位的版权声明，绑定软件的 NOTICE 文件的内容和必要的第三方声明。NOTICE only contains the project name, ASF copyright, relocated copyright statements, contents of bundled software NOTICE files and required third party notices.
